tweets.author: Gautam Rege
tweets.text: Loved #rubyconfpt Well done organizers. It time for me to GO. C you all next year. Get some Rust üòâ

tweets.author: Some(@steveklabnik)
tweets.text: It was @rubyconfpt's first year, but you wouldn't have known. What a great conf.

tweets.author: Katrina Owen
tweets.text: Thank you so much to everyone at @rubyconfpt for making the conference such a great experience. It was a pleasure meeting you all.

tweets.author: Jeremy Walker
tweets.text: I feel like I've spent about 2% of the time I would have liked to with everyone at #rubyconfpt. Met some amazing lovely people here. Ruby++

tweets.author: Falk K√∂ppe
tweets.text: #Fyber thanks the awesome speakers, organizers and attendees for the terrific #rubyconfpt. It's been a blast!!!11 Hope to see you next time!

tweets.author: Caleb Thompson
tweets.text: #Fyber thanks the awesome speakers, organizers and attendees for the terrific #rubyconfpt. It's been a blast!!!11 Hope to see you next time!

tweets.author: RedLight Software
tweets.text: Living a @rubyconfpt hangover. We're truly proud of being part of such event. Congratulations to the organizing team and everyone involved.

tweets.author: Jumpseller
tweets.text: @rubyconfpt We're the ones thanking you for hosting this great event

tweets.author: Bodo Tasche
tweets.text: Back in the @bitcrowd office. Missing @rubyconfpt already. Such an amazing event.

tweets.author: Jos√© Mota
tweets.text: @rubyconfpt Again, congratulations on marking a new era for Ruby in Portugal. We needed this.

tweets.author: Erik Michaels-Ober
tweets.text: Many thanks to @groupbuddies‚Äîthe organizers of @rubyconfpt‚Äîfor creating such a special event. Hope to stay in touch with all my new friends.
